about_the_game:
Add Gaten, the Crow Knight, and Vincenzo, the Doctor, to your roster! This DLC includes single-player campaigns for Gaten and Vincenzo, and unlocks both characters permanently for use in multiplayer.

  • Guide the soulbound Gaten as he hunts Vincenzo across war torn Kasalli. Gaten's Hardened Armor ability boosts the defenses of allies, while his Screech makes enemy units weaker.
  • Lead Vincenzo on his quest to find purpose in a world filled with suffering. Vincenzo can heal allied units near him and his pistol can be charged with a powerful attack.

Purchase of any DLC also unlocks Skirmish mode! Challenge a local opponent or the AI in custom battles! Choose any map and any unlocked Perks to go head-to-head offline and practice your skills!
